sqlMessage: In aggregated query without GROUP BY, expression #1 of SELECT list contains nonaggregated column 'ds_public.ds_tenant_system.did'; this is incompatible with sql_mode=only_full_group_by
sql:
select ds_tenant_system.did as ds_tenant_system_did,ds_tenant_system.ds_left_did as ds_tenant_system_ds_left_did,ds_tenant_system.ds_right_did as ds_tenant_system_ds_right_did,ds_tenant_system.ds_update_time as ds_tenant_system_ds_update_time,ds_tenant_system.ds_create_time as ds_tenant_system_ds_create_time, GROUP_CONCAT(ds_tenant.did) as ds_tenant_did, GROUP_CONCAT(ds_tenant.ds_key) as ds_tenant_ds_key, GROUP_CONCAT(ds_tenant.ds_name) as ds_tenant_ds_name, GROUP_CONCAT(ds_tenant.ds_type) as ds_tenant_ds_type, GROUP_CONCAT(ds_tenant.ds_dec) as ds_tenant_ds_dec, GROUP_CONCAT(ds_tenant.ds_update_time) as ds_tenant_ds_update_time, GROUP_CONCAT(ds_tenant.ds_create_time) as ds_tenant_ds_create_time, GROUP_CONCAT(ds_system.did) as ds_system_did, GROUP_CONCAT(ds_system.ds_key) as ds_system_ds_key, GROUP_CONCAT(ds_system.ds_name) as ds_system_ds_name, GROUP_CONCAT(ds_system.ds_type) as ds_system_ds_type, GROUP_CONCAT(ds_system.ds_dec) as ds_system_ds_dec, GROUP_CONCAT(ds_system.ds_update_time) as ds_system_ds_update_time, GROUP_CONCAT(ds_system.ds_create_time) as ds_system_ds_create_time
                                    from ds_tenant_system
                                    left join ds_tenant on ds_tenant.did=ds_tenant_system.ds_left_did  left join ds_system on ds_system.did=ds_tenant_system.ds_right_did  left join ds_system_module on ds_system_module.ds_left_did=ds_system.did
